thread.section_title: LensDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LensDirect | lensdirect.com | 2 of 42
thread.title: Victoria

author: Victoria
title: Victoria
text: I was initially worried about buying from here simply because I was weary about the website. Price so low? How could that be? Well, I read over previous reviews and thought to give it a try. At first, it took awhile awhile to get my prescription approved but once that happened, shipping was fairly quick. I received my contacts (ordered 16 boxes, I think) and they were packaged very well. I had to try them on right away and it was very exciting. I reached out to Kathryn and thanked her for comforting my worrisome. The staff is incredible and I will be buying more from them! So thank you, LensDirect.
